testcase.name: OS_001_Submit prescription types
testcase.summary: To Verify submit prescription types on order success page for single vision

testcase.name: OS_002_Submit prescription manually for single vision order with sph only
testcase.summary: To Verify submit prescription manually on order success page for single vision

step.actions: Click on Enter prescription manually icon
step.expectedresults: Click on Enter prescription manually icon

step.actions: Select right and-or left eye sph powers from drop-down
step.expectedresults: Select right and-or left eye sph powers from drop-down

step.actions: Click on Submit eye power button
step.expectedresults: Click on Submit eye power button

step.actions: Click on Submit eye power button
step.expectedresults: Click on Submit eye power button

testcase.name: OS_003_Submit prescription manually for single vision order with sph cyl and axis
testcase.summary: To Verify submit all prescription manually on order success page for single vision

step.actions: Click on Enter prescription manually icon
step.expectedresults: Click on Enter prescription manually icon

step.actions: Select right and-or left eye sph powers from drop-down
step.expectedresults: Select right and-or left eye sph powers from drop-down

step.actions: Check I have cylindrical cyl power checkbox
step.expectedresults: Check I have cylindrical cyl power checkbox

step.actions: Select right and-or left eye cyl powers from drop-down
step.expectedresults: Select right and-or left eye cyl powers from drop-down

step.actions: Select right and-or left eye axis powers from drop-down
step.expectedresults: Select right and-or left eye axis powers from drop-down

step.actions: Click on Submit eye power button
step.expectedresults: Click on Submit eye power button

step.actions: Click on Submit eye power button
step.expectedresults: Click on Submit eye power button

testcase.name: OS_004_Submit prescription using saved prescription for single vision order
testcase.summary: To Verify submit prescription using saved prescription on order success page for single vision

step.actions: Click on Use saved prescription icon
step.expectedresults: Click on Use saved prescription icon

step.actions: Click on select button to select saved power
step.expectedresults: Click on select button to select saved power

step.actions: Click on select button to select saved power
step.expectedresults: Click on select button to select saved power

testcase.name: OS_005_Submit prescription by upload prescription for single vision order
testcase.summary: To Verify submit prescription by upload prescription on order success page for single vision

step.actions: Click on upload button to upload power prescription image in jpg png gif format of filesize less than 2MB
step.expectedresults: Click on upload button to upload power prescription image in jpg png gif format of filesize less than 2MB

step.actions: Select the image file in the required format and size
step.expectedresults: Select the image file in the required format and size

testcase.name: OS_006_Submit prescription by callback for single vision order
testcase.summary: To Verify submit prescription by callback on order success page for single vision

step.actions: Click on Request A Call Back icon
step.expectedresults: Click on Request A Call Back icon

testcase.name: OS_007_Submit prescription over email for single vision order

step.actions: Click on Send It Via Email icon
